title: How to download videos without internet download manager - Quora

response.answer_text: depends on from which website you use.. if from YouTube or Dailymotion - Watch, publish, share videos  and many others..then make sure ur idm extension is properly enabled in your chrome browser then a download button will appear on upper right side which can do the task.or if you are using firefox then install flashgot add-on which manually grabs each video and deploy IDM download dialogue..if problem persists then ask me...
